response.original_title: Danger Close: The Battle of Long Tan
response.overview: Vietnam War, 1966. Australia and New Zealand send troops to support the United States and South Vietnamese in their fight against the communist North. Soldiers are very young men, recruits and volunteers who have never been involved in a combat. On August 18th, members of Delta Company will face the true horror of a ruthless battle among the trees of a rubber plantation called Long Tân. They are barely a hundred. The enemy is a human wave ready to destroy them.
response.tagline: Outnumbered. Outgunned. Never out of courage.
response.title: Danger Close: The Battle of Long Tan

titles.title: Danger Close - La battaglia di Long Tan
デンジャー・クロース 極限着弾
